page.title: 09MACHINERY IN THE HOME
page.content: New machines are always being invented and becoming readily available either for business purposes or enjoyment. Some of the household ones are{ {dishwashers},{washing machines, {tumble dryers, freezers and home {computers. }The dishwasher and washing machine are largish box-shaped machines which do what their name suggests, wash dishes or clothes. Tumble dryers dry the clothes by spinning them in warm air. This dries them quicker than by hanging them on the line. Freezers are used to store large quantities of frozen meat and vegetables. This way food stays fresh and can be used at any time. These unlike computers are easy to use. Home computers can be programmed to do what you want them to do. They are mostly used for games and word processing in offices.
